title: The Week of Xavier White: Teacher of Light

story.text: Xavier White starts his week with a morning prayer, seeking guidance and strength. He spends the rest of the day teaching at the local school, unaware that this week will unveil his hidden powers.
During a school fire drill, Xavier instinctively directs everyone to safety with uncanny precision and speed, noticing his ability to see pathways of safety as clear visions.

Xavier spends his evening in prayer, troubled by the day's revealing events. He realizes that these abilities may be divinely granted and decides to embrace them, proposing to use them for the greater good.
Testing his new abilities, Xavier helps a lost child find her parents in a crowded festival. His vision guides him through the maze of people straight to her worried parents.
Word of Xavierâ€™s deeds spreads, and he is approached by a local community leader asking for help in resolving a potentially dangerous conflict in the neighborhood.
Using his visionary guidance, Xavier successfully mediates the conflict, preventing violence and fostering a newfound peace among the disputing parties.
Reflecting on his week, Xavier attends a thanksgiving service at his church, quietly thankful for his gift and resolved to use it to teach and protect his community.

ending: And so, Xavier White embraced his destiny, forever changed yet anchored by his humble beginnings.
moral: With great power comes not only responsibility but the chance for profound positive impact.
